statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT location_name, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 100;
SELECT location_name, average_speed FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT location_name, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, average_speed FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume < 50 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC, average_speed ASC
SELECT location_name, average_speed FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000
SELECT location_name, traffic_volume, average_speed FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location_id < 10 AND average_speed BETWEEN 50 AND 80
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) AS avg_traffic_volume, MAX(average_speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_patterns
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY location_name
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns;
SELECT location_id, traffic_volume FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE distance < 10;
SELECT average_speed, traffic_volume FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE average_speed > 50 ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY average_speed DESC
SELECT location_id, traffic_volume FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE average_speed < 50
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY start_location
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE end_location = 5
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT intersection_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_flow = 'Heavy';
SELECT  intersection_id, traffic_flow FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY intersection_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_miles FROM city_routes WHERE distance_miles > 10;
SELECT location, camera_status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE intersection_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM city_routes WHERE distance_miles > 10 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT start_location, end_location FROM city_routes WHERE distance_miles < 5;
SELECT intersection_id, traffic_flow FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY intersection_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance_miles FROM city_routes WHERE start_location = 'Downtown' AND end_location = 'Airport';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_status = 'Offline' AND location LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT id, location_id, date FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT traffic_volume, date FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY date DESC, traffic_volume ASC, location_id
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT analysis_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_analysis WHERE congestion_level = 'High' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT route_name, length_km FROM transportation_routes WHERE length_km > 100 ORDER BY length_km DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns JOIN transportation_routes ON traffic_patterns.location_id = transportation_routes.route_id
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM Routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM Stops WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT pattern_id, route_id, congestion_level, average_speed FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE average_speed < 50;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance < 50 ORDER BY route_name ASC;

SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes LEFT JOIN Schedule ON Routes.route_id = Schedule.route_id WHERE Schedule.arrival_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Schedule.departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, COUNT(*) AS num_stops FROM Routes LEFT JOIN Stops ON Routes.route_id = Stops.route_id GROUP BY route_name ORDER BY num_stops DESC;

SELECT pattern_id, route_name, congestion_level, average_speed FROM TrafficPatterns INNER JOIN Routes ON TrafficPatterns.route_id = Routes.route_id WHERE average_speed > 40 ORDER BY average_speed DESC LIMIT 5;
